title: my shop
body:
Hi, after the "my shop" was reoppened  2 of my skins changed, by luck, they only ones i was going to buy, i'm asking to know what happened for the skins to be excluded and maybe get them back since none of my friends got theyr skins changed.
Thank you for reading

replies.body: Everyones Personal Shop was reset after it was taken down and brought back up, although some people might have seen a couple of the same ones. If you wanted one of the first offers, just hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=drKE9EuZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-19T21:40:09.226+0000)
>
> Everyones Personal Shop was reset after it was taken down and brought back up, although some people might have seen a couple of the same ones. If you wanted one of the first offers, just hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

What request type do you use for the ticket?
Feel free to use the billing/RP option.
